name: Nightmare
description: 2 scare this turn and next. Distance: 6

name: Frighten
description: Target loses two moves next turn. Distance: 3.
effect: No scares frighten you next turn.

name: Boo!
description: Scare: 4, Distance: 1. Must be behind target.

name: Sprint
effect: Running within 1 tile of target causes 1 scare

name: Mirror Image
description:
Duplicate your character for 2 turns. Duplicate can be scared, 
may open treasures, and may deliver scares. At the 
end of the 2nd turn, player can move to either location.

name: Ward
description:
Leave at your location. Ward can not be scared. Ward is returned to deck
after 3 turns. Scare: 1, Distance: 4
effect: May scare through walls this turn.

name: Booby Trap
description:
Target treasure explodes, becoming unopenable for 1 round. 
Scare: 3, distance: 7, through walls
